title: Fixing communication issues
body:
I believe that there should be a chat section that is organised by how the server receives messages from the lobby rather than how the client receives the messages. Why? Because the chat shows up differently to people leading to arguments and insta-locking contests which brings up my second thing:

Remove the 'lock' feature from normals. This is SERIOUSLY never used positively. What does it achieve? It allows you to lock in a champion and force your position onto other people. It forces people out of certain roles because "lol sorry I locked". If the above were implemented it would be easy to pick the trolls from the legit people.
